Privacy Policy for The Home Keeper

Last updated: August 25, 2025

1. Information We Collect

The Home Keeper collects the following information:

  • Google Account Information: Your name, email address, and profile picture when you sign in with Google
  • Home Maintenance Data: Property information, maintenance tasks, schedules, and completion records you enter
  • Calendar Data: We access your Google Calendar only to create and manage maintenance task events

2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Provide home maintenance scheduling and tracking services
  • Sync your maintenance tasks with your Google Calendar
  • Store your maintenance records and property information
  • Send you maintenance reminders and notifications

3. Data Storage and Security

  • Local Storage: Your maintenance data is primarily stored locally in your browser
  • Google Services: We use Google Firebase for authentication and Google Calendar API for calendar integration
  • No Third-Party Sharing: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties
  • Security: All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS

4. Google Calendar Access

The Home Keeper requests access to your Google Calendar to:

  • Create calendar events for your maintenance tasks
  • Update existing maintenance task events when you reschedule
  • Delete calendar events when you complete or remove tasks

We only access calendar events that we create - we do not read, modify, or access your other calendar events.

5. Data Retention

  • Your maintenance data remains in your browser's local storage until you clear it
  • Google Calendar events are managed according to your Google Calendar settings
  • You can revoke calendar access at any time through your Google Account settings

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access, update, or delete your maintenance data within the app
  • Revoke Google Calendar access at any time
  • Export your data by copying it from the app interface
  • Delete your account and all associated data

7. Children's Privacy

The Home Keeper is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy.

9. Contact Information

If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

  • Website: thehomekeeper.com
  • Email: [Your contact email]

10. Third-Party Services

The Home Keeper uses the following third-party services:

  • Google Firebase: For user authentication (Firebase Privacy Policy)
  • Google Calendar API: For calendar integration (Google Privacy Policy)
  • Vercel: For web hosting (Vercel Privacy Policy)
